title: #Settings

enumDescriptions.OnReset: Apply the requested operation on a reset.
enumDescriptions.AtMaintenanceWindowStart: Apply the requested operation during a maintenance window as specified by an administrator.
enumDescriptions.InMaintenanceWindowOnReset: Apply the requested operation after a reset but within maintenance window as specified by an adminstrator.
